listing.listing_description:
Seashell-pink drapes flutter in the breeze at the floor-to-ceiling windows of this ultra modern Sicily retreat. Its two buildings nestle between tree-dotted hillsides sloping gently toward the sea in the distance, which you can see from terraces both sun-splashed and shaded. Explore nature reserves and unspoiled beaches nearby, and drive 10 minutes to Noto to marvel at its 18th-century cathedral.

 Your holiday starts with a welcome basket of breakfast treats, and can continue in the swimming pool, on a lounger in the sun, with a glass of wine under the pergola, or around the barbecue and al-fresco dining table. For more high-tech entertainment, there’s a satellite TV and Wi-Fi, and for your comfort, there’s air conditioning and a washing machine.

 On the outside, the crisp angles of this luxury home are broken up by round porthole windows; on the inside, round mirrors and velour textures add softness to the sleek, open-concept great room. Not only is there plenty of seating on tufted sofas and around a dining table for ten, but there are also two fully equipped kitchens.

 There are three bedrooms in the main house of this vacation rental, all with king beds, en-suite bathrooms, and a private terrace or balcony. There are also two bedrooms in a separate guest house—one with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and one with a twin sofa bed and hall bathroom—that’s ideal for a family with a younger child or a couple wanting a honeymoon-style escape.

 The villa’s surroundings are quintessential Italy: snug fishing villages, great seafood restaurants, ruins dotted through the countryside, beautiful beaches, and landmark architecture. Visit a nearby nature reserve known as the Grand Canyon of Italy, sample Nero d’Avola (the local red wine), stroll Loggia Beach, and time your visit to Noto for golden hour, when the setting sun glows against the ornate detail on the city’s baroque buildings.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Chalet Dalmore is an exquisite contemporary chalet in Chamonix. Situated just one kilometer from La Flegere cable car at Mont Blanc Ski Resort, the villa features spectacular, panoramic views of iconic Mont Blanc from a private setting of supreme seclusion. With outstanding alfresco living areas including a pool and hot tub, superb spa facilities, and stunning interior spaces, Chalet Dalmore is one of the finest vacation rentals in the French Alps. A catered option with complimentary gourmet meals and beverages provides an especially luxurious experience of the Chamonix lifestyle.

Nestled amid enchanting alpine forests, the villa's unique design combines classic chalet charm with modernist principles. Returning from a day on the mountain, enjoy evenings together in the gorgeous, open-plan living-and-dining-room, kindling a fire in the fireplace (a work of art in its own right), savoring a fine wine in the sumptuous lounge, and beholding the spectacular vistas. Then gather at the beautiful dining table for a delectable, four-course feast. At night or during downtime, gather in the excellent media lounge with cozy sofas and large television, or withdraw to the wonderful attic-level lounge, with beautiful furnishings and lovely views.

Outstanding spa facilities and alfresco living areas add a superb dimension to Chalet Dalmore. Enjoy a delicious soak in the outdoor hot tub, savoring the crisp air and dreamy fragrances of the forest, and plunge into the ample swimming pool. Enjoy time in the indoor sauna, and treat yourself to a well-deserved massage.

The villa's five bedroom suites all feature a queen bed (or two singles), ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bathtub, and direct access to furnished balconies. The master suite enjoys a private balcony and an electric fireplace. With room for ten, the villa is ideal for families, large groups of friends, and destination wedding guests.

Chalet Dalmore balances exquisite privacy with outstanding access to some of the finest skiing, golf, and dining in the French Alps. You're just one kilometer from both La Flegere cable car at Mont Blanc and the entrance to Chamonix Golf Club, and about four kilometers to the heart of Chamonix, where world-class dining and nightlife await you.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Dreams of Parisian romance become reality at Luxury Trocadero. Discover your own private hideaway in the City of Light at an intimate vacation rental in the 16th arrondissement that’s just the right size for a honeymoon or idyllic escape. Hotel amenities and a full staff are ready to pamper, and when you’re ready to explore, the Eiffel Tower and the rest of the city are just around the corner.

Guests of Luxury Trocadero are welcome to use the shared pool, fitness center, steam room and library at the five-star La Réserve hotel; just use the in-villa iPad to call for the hotel’s limousine to whisk you from the apartment to La Réserve. Butler service, daily breakfast and afternoon tea are included in your stay, as are access to tennis courts and bicycles.

Though the villa is set in a classic Haussmann building—an imposing, cut-stone, 19th-century edifice—its interiors are cool, contemporary and utterly chic. The open-plan living and dining room have the gracious dimensions, tall windows and wrought-iron balconies of historic Parisian apartments, while furnishings like tuxedo-style sofas, a low-profile coffee table and a lacquered dining table feel sleek and modern. The fully equipped kitchen continues in this vein, with flat-fronted blond-wood cabinets wrapping around state-of-the-art appliances.

The single bedroom at Luxury Trocadero is perfect for a couple, though it could also accommodate two friends or family members on a French holiday. The bedroom is its own haven, with a four-poster queen bed and sitting area, but the en-suite bathroom raises the stakes in relaxation with a balneotherapy bathtub and rain shower.

A location in the Passy-Trocadero area puts the city’s most iconic sights at your doorstep. Not only is the Eiffel Tower visible from the apartment’s balcony, it’s just a short walk away, as are the restaurants lining the Avenue d’Eylau and the greenery along Avenue Georges Mandel. Take a short taxi or subway ride (or a long walk) to the galleries of the Louvre, the awe-inspiring Notre-Dame Cathedral or the urban oasis of the Luxembourg Gardens.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

ul.li: Bedroom 1 - Master: Queen size bed, Ensuite bathroom with balneotherapy bathtub, Rain Shower, Television, Safe

listing.listing_description:
Greet the sunrise over the Aegean Sea from this contemporary villa in Marathon. Situated on a 1,000-square-meter estate near the easternmost edge of the Attic Peninsula, the home is just minutes from several beaches and about 40 kilometers from Athens. Expansive living spaces form an ideal haven for families and large groups of friends, enhanced by an extraordinary collection of original artwork.

The villa’s luminous white minimalism alludes to ancient Aegean architecture, accentuating the rich blues of the sky and sea. Dip into the swimming pool and bathe in the sunlight. Grill up fresh seafood and vegetables for a meze platter, and uncork a bottle of local wine in the lounge. Gather for casual afternoon meals at the poolside tables, or a family feast under the veranda. At night, turn on the outdoor lighting to continue the revelry under the stars.

Inside, a capacious living room features high ceilings and tufted leather sofas facing a fireplace. The formal dining table is perched on a platform overlooking the living room, flowing gracefully into the chef-grade kitchen. Pluck a volume from the library for a meditative afternoon; retreat into the office suite for an important project; or summon the spirits of the ancient astronomers with the telescope at night.

Four bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms can accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to 8 in size. The deluxe master suite includes a private lounge with fireplace, while the 3 guestrooms enjoy access to balconies with inspiring views.

This tranquil location offers easy access to the peninsula’s rustic beauty, seaside delights, and historical treasures. Beach-lovers will want to visit Schinias, Sessi, and Varnavas, while history buffs will appreciate the Marathon Tomb and the Maraton Archeological Museums. Take the family to the Attica Zoological Park, or drive into Athens for a trip to the Acropolis and dinner in the charming Plaka neighborhood.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Incredible views stretch out before Vila Mar Azul. As its name, which translates to “blue sea,” suggests, this sleek vacation rental boasts an oceanfront location and the panoramas to match. Use this clifftop retreat as a luxury hideaway in the Algarve, or as a base for a laid-back family holiday in the charming beach town of Salema.

The villa’s three levels of living space make the most of its stunning location—and open to outdoor areas where you can soak in the sun. A sparkling pool, loungers, barbecue and al-fresco dining for eight let you entertain or relax from dawn to dusk. After dark, watch the stars come out or step inside to enjoy the satellite TV, DVD player and Wi-Fi.

Vila Mar Azul has one open-plan living area on its main floor, with living and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen, and a second on its lower level, complete with a second kitchen. A fireplace and plush area rug create a cozy ambience in the main-floor living area; a few steps up, cantilevered chairs add modern style around the dining table.

Each of the villa’s six bedrooms has a king bed and en-suite bathroom. There are two on the main level and three on an upper story. The sixth bedroom is part of the lower-level apartment and opens to a terrace; its private living area means it could be used as a honeymoon-style suite or quiet accommodations for in-laws.

The villa is a short walk from the town of Salema—once a fishing village known for its octopus, now a popular spot for its golden stretch of beach. Slow down to its pace, and you’ll be rewarded with the sight of fishermen hauling in their catch or an afternoon at one of its waterfront restaurants. Golf courses, tennis courts and a spa are a short drive away at Santo Antonio Resort; for more shopping and dining options, drive into Lagos.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Like a French version of a zen garden, an olive tree reaches for the sun amid a white-stoned courtyard at this traditional-with-a-twist estate in the country. While the villa has all the elements of a quintessential Provençal farmhouse—stone walls, tiled roof, Alpilles views—it also has a window-walled eat-in kitchen. The Eygalieres setting means you’re 10 minutes from Saint-Remy de Provence.

Face off against family and friends on the villa’s outdoor bocce court and ping-pong table, soak in the sun from a lounger by the swimming pool, sample France’s best wines in the outdoor sitting area, and make dinner on the plancha-style barbecue to serve at 3 alfresco tables set under flowering vines. In the evenings, pour a glass from the wine fridge to sip by the wood-burning fireplace, turn on the TV and surround-sound system, or browse via Wi-Fi. Your holiday also includes daily housekeeping and the services of an on-call private concierge.

Whitewashed wood beams, a fireplace, and an ornate chandelier give the living room at this luxury property rustic-chic appeal. The vibe is a little more country-industrial in an open-plan dining room and fully equipped kitchen with exposed wood beams and walls of metal-framed windows.

This vacation rental has 6 bedrooms with queen beds, including a master suite and 1 bedroom with its own balcony. There’s also a children’s room with 6 twin beds. All 6 queen bedrooms and the children’s room have ensuite bathrooms and air conditioning.

Spend days walking around the stone architecture in the village of Eygalieres, or drive down through olive groves and vineyards to the town of Saint-Remy de Provence, made famous in van Gogh’s paintings. Follow the sound of fountains to hidden squares, try local produce from the market, and give yourself a little honeymoon from the ordinary over a drink at one of the cafes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Traditional architecture and modern decor are the perfect pairing at the enchanting Can Paola. Modeled on the classic fincas of Spain, this private Ibiza vacation rental is set on more than seven acres in the countryside outside San Jose. Its nearly 4,000 square feet of living space and five bedrooms, however, can welcome groups of up to ten friends or family members in contemporary luxury.

The views from Can Paola stretch from the property's own lush gardens to the surrounding hillsides all the way to the sea. Take in the vistas from gorgeous outdoor living areas with a pool, lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and a tennis court. After sunset, continue the games indoors over the ping-pong table or unwind with the help of the sound system and Wi-Fi.

While the villa's interiors are open plan, with one room flowing into the next, there are also plenty of quiet nooks where you can catch up on reading or steal a nap. Traditional details such as beamed ceilings, stone walls, terracotta floors and an open-hearth fireplace lend charm in the living and dining rooms, while a wide sliding door lets you open the spaces to the sunny terrace outside. The fully equipped kitchen is all modern, with stainless steel appliances and bold artwork.

There are two bedrooms in the main house at Can Paola; both have king beds, one has an en-suite bathroom and the other has access to a hall bathroom. The other three bedrooms-two of which have king beds and one of which has two twin beds-have en-suite bathrooms and exterior access, making them perfect for use as a honeymoon-style retreat or a separate haven for in-laws.

While Can Paola feels like its own rural idyll, it's only a short drive from oceanfront dining in the town of Sant Josep de sa Talaia and several beaches, including lively Es Torrent and scenic Cala Jondal. No holiday on the island is complete without a visit to Ibiza Town, whether for its historic buildings or its famed nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Step into a Tuscan dream at Villa Marciano. This vacation rental in the Florence area ticks all the boxes: stunning views of vineyards and olive groves with San Gimignano on the horizon, quintessential farmhouse charm and modern amenities for a luxury experience. Reserve the property’s seven bedrooms for a family reunion, a milestone celebration with friends or a truly intimate destination wedding in the Italian countryside.

Take in the views from the sun-splashed terrace by the infinity pool or sample local wines around an al-fresco dining table for fourteen. The villa also has satellite TV, Wi-Fi and a fireplace for cozy evenings in. Daily housekeeping and cook service is available at extra cost.

Though the villa was once a farmhouse, it’s now a comfortable modern residence. The sitting and dining rooms still feature high beamed ceilings and terracotta floors alongside graceful seating and elegant accent tables. The separate kitchen is sleek and fully equipped with chef-worthy appliances.

Each of the seven bedrooms at Villa Marciano has a queen bed, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. Several of the beds can be arranged as two twin beds if desired. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are classic Tuscany: terracotta floors, beamed ceilings and soft-hued walls.

Spend your stay taking a honeymoon from the everyday at the villa or exploring the area. It’s only a 15-minute drive from San Donato in Poggio and Castellina in Chianti, two must-see medieval towns, and there are plenty of wineries where you can stop off for a tasting on your way. It’s well worth planning a day trip into the cities of Florence or Siena, both about a 45-minute drive from the villa, for their architecture, culture and cuisine.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set between two beautiful avenues lined with majestic trees, La Réserve de Paris stands out in this iconic city with its domed slate roof. Enjoy that certain je ne sais quoi about returning home each day to this timeless area of the world. Eiffel Hideaway faces the Place du Trocadero with the many terraces of its old-time brasseries. Experience the romance of the City of Light with exceptional views of the Eiffel Tower in an authentic vacation rental with Luxury Retreats!

This chic and intimate accommodation is located in a splendid Haussmann-style, cut-stone building. In the ideal setting for a discreet, private getaway to stylish Trocadero, even the housekeeper will be virtually invisible while serving each morning’s personalized breakfast. Guests of Eiffel Hideaway will receive complimentary access to all the hotel services of La Réserve de Paris, a five-star hotel and spa that will make daily life even more magical. Facilities include a swimming pool, fitness center, steam room and library.

This beautiful and spacious apartment features well-delineated day and night areas, which means that children can sleep peacefully while parents are hosting friends in the vast formal dining room. The remarkably sized windows ensure the living room is flooded with light that illuminates the modern works of art. With stunning classic architecture, the contemporary interior design creates a magnificent contrast that embodies the new Parisian chic.

Three bedrooms accommodate up to six guests at this non-smoking apartment. All bedrooms provide queen size beds, en-suite bathrooms and televisions. One of the suites also has a rain shower and a balneotherapy tub. Fine linens and accoutrements provide splendid nights of rest amid the hushed frequencies of the city. We recommend Eiffel Hideaway for a family getaway, a couples’ retreat or a decadent honeymoon in this unrivaled cultural destination.

Guests of Eiffel Hideaway will enjoy the services of a full, professional staff. Daily housekeeping, butler service, daily breakfasts, a welcome package, daily afternoon tea times, laundry service and limousine service are all included with your holiday reservation. Sportive guests will also love use of the bicycles and complimentary access to the Roland Garros Tennis Courts, home of the French Open. Paris never looked so good!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Masseria Oliva is a beautifully restored villa in Italy’s Apulia region, along the Adriatic coast, minutes from the beach and the famed town of Ostuni. Nestled amid olive groves that stretch toward the sea, the classic masseria (a type of fortified farmhouse native to the region) was originally built in the 1860s. The current owners have maintained the villa's antique charm while updating it with superb modern amenities for cooking, dining, and relaxation. The walled estate includes a large swimming pool, beautiful alfresco dining patios, a citrus grove, and a vegetable garden. Three charming bedrooms provide comfortable accommodations for six guests.

The villa is set amid the classic dry-stone walls native to the region, with gorgeous views over the coastal landscape. Savor a dip in the sparkling pool and bask in the sunlight on lovely lounge chairs. Kindle the barbeque in the afternoon and relish a delicious lunch on the beautiful, vine-clad patio. Sip digestivi at the bar, and linger outdoors in the enchanting Puglian evening.

Multiple sets of French doors invite dreamy views and garden-scented breezes into the home. The kitchen is fully equipped for the contemporary gourmet, and easily serves both the interior and alfresco dining areas. The beautifully furnished living room is ideal for savoring a bottle of wine together in the tranquil night. Contemporary features include Apple TV, a Hi-Fi sound system, Wi-Fi, a washer/dryer, and a home office. An underground heating and cooling system keeps you comfortable at all times of year.

All three rooms have double-size beds (one of which can be converted into two single-size beds), along with ensuite bathrooms. There is also an additional room with a single-size bed and ensuite bathroom, ideal for a nanny or extra guest.

Located on the Fasano-Ostuni road, the villa is perfectly situated for exploring the villages and beaches of Puglia and the Salento. You’re just five kilometers from Ceglie Messapica and seven from the famed “white city” (Citta Bianca) of Ostuni. The beaches and seaside dining at Rosa Marina, Torre Santa Sabina, and Torre Canne are minutes away, and you're about a half-hour from the sublime Valle d’Itria.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
As its name would suggest, this stunning vacation rental perfectly captures the silhouette of the most iconic of all Paris’ landmarks. The two bedroom Tour Eiffel in Trocadero will surely delight both young and old from sunrise right through nightfall, when the “iron lady” sparkles in the midnight blue sky. The Eiffel Tower seems so close from this apartment that you almost get the impression it is shining just for you!

This chic and intimate luxury accommodation is located in a splendid Haussmann-style, cut-stone building. In the ideal setting for a discreet and romantic getaway to stylish Trocadero, even the housekeeper will be virtually invisible while serving each morning’s personalized breakfast. Guests of Tour Eiffel will receive complimentary access to all the hotel services of La Réserve de Paris, a five-star hotel and spa that will make daily life even more magical. Facilities include a swimming pool, fitness center, steam room and library.

The interiors are quite spacious for a private apartment located in the heart of Paris. The furnishings are contemporary with a pleasing monochromatic palette. The open plan great room features a living room with a sectional couch, a dining area and a kitchen with a serving bar. Modern artworks reflect the avant-garde spirit of the City of Light.

Two bedrooms accommodate up to four guests at this non-smoking apartment. Both bedrooms provide queen size beds, en-suite bathrooms and televisions. One of the suites also has a rain shower and a balneotherapy tub. Fine linens and accoutrements provide splendid nights of rest amid the hushed frequencies of the city. We recommend Tour Eiffel for a family getaway, a couples’ retreat or a decadent honeymoon in this unrivaled cultural destination.

Guests of Tour Eiffel will enjoy the services of a full, professional staff. Daily housekeeping, butler service, daily breakfasts, a welcome package, daily afternoon tea times, laundry service and valet service are all included with your holiday reservation. Sportive guests will also love use of the bicycles and complimentary access to the Roland Garros Tennis Courts, home of the French Open. Paris never looked so good!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Like a living museum, this elegant apartment in Lisbon tells a story with its collection of fine art. Follow hardwood floors to discover thoughtfully curated designer furnishings, ornate lighting, and breathtaking azulejo tiling. Step outside to the courtyard to sip your morning tea. Then, walk 9 minutes to Alfama, one of Portugal’s oldest areas, for breakfast in a small cafe or bakery.

Beneath chandelier lights, Casa dell’Arte Club House’s stately living room is the perfect place to celebrate a special occasion. Before dinner in the azulejo-tiled dining room, enjoy a cocktail while you discuss your favorite pieces of art. Bring in a private chef to prepare a menu of traditional Portuguese favorites in the fully-equipped kitchen. After dinner, move the party to the courtyard for one more glass of wine. Then, retire to one of the themed bedrooms, all with king-sized beds and lavish ensuites.

Wake up early to dig your feet into the sand along the shore of Cascais Beach. Once the sun has risen and the shops have opened, treat yourself to breakfast at a beachside cafe. Then, visit some of Lisbon’s most important historical sites, Rossio Square, Castelo de S. Jorge, and the Tower of Belem. For lunch, seafood lovers will need to visit the waterfront district, Cais do Sodre, for the city’s hippest tapas restaurants. And at night, Barrio Alto is the spot for bar hopping.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Water falling from the vertical garden into the courtyard swimming pool sets a soothing tone at this ultra-modern home in Lisbon’s fashion district. Catch up on a little reading in the library. Stretch out next to the wood-burning fireplace. And, explore the loft’s extensive collection of contemporary art. If you’re feeling inspired, set out to find nearby art galleries and lovely bistros.

The classic combination of pure-white and lightly toned wood never fails to create a relaxing atmosphere, and Loft 58 is the perfect place to escape the bustling city. Clear sight-lines and floor-to-ceiling windows give the loft an airy, Bohemian feel. Follow the wood floors to each room, proudly displaying thoughtfully selected art. In the ensuites, you’ll love the rich marble and high-end fixtures. The kitchen is sure to awaken your inner chef, maybe even try your hand at some traditional Portuguese dishes.

Portugal is known for its blue-tile art called azulejos, which is always on display at the National Museum, 6-minutes from home. After a morning at the museum, visit Alfama and wander the city’s oldest neighborhood, following winding streets lined with small cafes, delicious bakeries, and tapas restaurants. Then, set out to snap a few pictures at the Tower of Belem, Jeronimos Monastery, and Castelo de S. Jorge. At night, Barrio Alto is the nightlife district, with dozens of trendy bars on cobblestone streets.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
